summary: Proud German owners of Opel Manta's race the streets against VW's and Mercedes. They decide to set up a real race with lots of money involved.
cast: Til Schweiger|Tina Ruland|Stefan Gebelhoff|Lena Sabine Berg|Michael Kessler|Nadja Naidenow|Ömer Simsek|Beatrice Manowski|Martin Armknecht|Karin Johnson|Uwe Fellensiek|Jürgen Schornagel|Jockel Tschiersch|Olaf Ploetz|Liz Becker|Paul Faßnacht|Alexander von Eisenhart-Rothe|Norman Price|Sepp Schauer|Werner Karle Jr.|Ruth Brück|Maria Mittler|Susanne Leutenegger|Rolf Dennemann|Willi Thomczyk|Ernst Petry|Horst D. Scheel|Udo Jolly|Manfred Krasky
title: Manta, Manta
